meanings.definition: A type of alcoholic beverage made from fermented pears.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a glass of perries with my dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The local brewery is known for its delicious perries.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone was talking about the perries and how refreshing they were.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a glass of sparkling perries.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the perries filled the room, enticing everyone to take a sip.

meanings.sent1: The Perries family has a long history in this town.
meanings.sent2: I met the Perries at the community event last week.
meanings.sent3: Mr. and Mrs. Perries always host the best neighborhood barbecues.
meanings.sent4: The Perries clan gathered for a family reunion in the park.
